scenario_text_en: In a tense meeting, the group is leaning toward a decision you disagree with.
scenario_text_ar: في اجتماع متوتر، المجموعة تميل لقرار لا تقتنع به.

scenario_text_en: A friend disappoints you with a repeated mistake.
scenario_text_ar: صديق يكرر خطأ يزعجك رغم أنك نبهته سابقاً.

scenario_text_en: You receive unclear feedback from a manager: 'Improve your impact.'
scenario_text_ar: يصلك تعليق غير واضح من مديرك: «طوّر أثرَك».

scenario_text_en: A conflict starts in a group chat. People are misunderstanding each other.
scenario_text_ar: يبدأ خلاف في مجموعة محادثة ويُسيء بعضهم فهم بعض.

scenario_text_en: A deadline is near, but the requirements keep changing.
Someone criticizes you publicly in front of others.
You are offered a new opportunity, but the risks are real.
scenario_text_ar: تُعرض عليك فرصة جديدة لكنها تحمل مخاطر واضحة.

scenario_text_en: A teammate is struggling and slowing the whole group.
You notice a small unfairness that benefits you if you stay silent.
scenario_text_ar: تلاحظ ظلماً صغيراً لصالحك إن بقيت صامتاً.

scenario_text_en: Two people you care about are in disagreement, and both want you on their side.
scenario_text_ar: شخصان مهمان لك على خلاف، وكلٌ يريدك في صفّه.

scenario_text_en: You have to make a decision with limited information.
You feel drained, but you promised to deliver something today.
scenario_text_ar: تشعر بالإرهاق لكنك وعدت بتسليم شيء اليوم.

scenario_text_en: Your family plans a weekend gathering but you feel exhausted.
scenario_text_ar: عائلتك تخطط لتجمع في عطلة نهاية الأسبوع لكنك تشعر بالإرهاق.

scenario_text_en: You receive an unexpected bonus at work.
scenario_text_ar: حصلت على مكافأة غير متوقعة في العمل.

scenario_text_en: A close friend is going through a difficult time.
You are offered a promotion that requires longer hours.
scenario_text_ar: عُرضت عليك ترقية تتطلب ساعات عمل أطول.

scenario_text_en: Your neighborhood starts a community initiative.
You have free time on a weekday evening.
scenario_text_ar: لديك وقت فراغ في مساء يوم عادي.

scenario_text_en: A disagreement happens between two colleagues.
scenario_text_ar: حدث خلاف بين زميلين في العمل.

scenario_text_en: You feel stuck in your current routine.
scenario_text_ar: تشعر بأنك عالق في روتينك الحالي.

scenario_text_en: A family member asks for financial help.
scenario_text_ar: أحد أفراد العائلة يطلب مساعدة مالية.

scenario_text_en: You are invited to join a new social group.
scenario_text_ar: تمت دعوتك للانضمام إلى مجموعة اجتماعية جديدة.

scenario_text_en: You face criticism about your performance.
You have saved some money and are deciding what to do with it.
scenario_text_ar: ادخرت مبلغًا من المال وتفكر كيف تستخدمه.

scenario_text_en: A friend invites you on a spontaneous trip.
You notice unfair treatment at work.
scenario_text_ar: لاحظت معاملة غير عادلة في العمل.

scenario_text_en: You feel emotionally distant from people around you.
scenario_text_ar: تشعر ببعد عاطفي عن من حولك.

scenario_text_en: You have multiple goals but limited time.
A new course becomes available in your field.
scenario_text_ar: أصبح هناك دورة جديدة متاحة في مجالك.

scenario_text_en: You are feeling overwhelmed by responsibilities.
A friend achieves something important.
You move to a new neighborhood.
You feel your health habits slipping.
scenario_text_ar: تشعر بأن عاداتك الصحية بدأت تتراجع.

scenario_text_en: Someone spreads a rumor about you.
You receive public recognition for your work.
You feel bored with your routine.
A relative asks for emotional support.
You are choosing between job stability and a risky opportunity.
scenario_text_ar: تختار بين وظيفة مستقرة وفرصة محفوفة بالمخاطر.

scenario_text_en: A team project depends on your contribution.
You feel disconnected from your personal beliefs.
Your expenses increase unexpectedly.
A friend forgets an important promise.
You have an opportunity to learn a new skill.
You feel tension between work and family time.
scenario_text_ar: تشعر بتوتر بين العمل ووقت العائلة.

scenario_text_en: Your team fails to meet a deadline.
scenario_text_ar: فريقك لم ينجح في تسليم العمل في الوقت.

scenario_text_en: You want to improve your daily mood.
A public issue affects your community.
You are considering a creative hobby.
A disagreement arises in your family.
You feel ambitious but unsure where to start.
scenario_text_ar: تشعر بالطموح لكنك غير متأكد من البداية.

scenario_text_en: You receive constructive advice.
You have an unexpected free weekend.
scenario_text_ar: لديك عطلة نهاية أسبوع غير متوقعة.

scenario_text_en: You notice someone being excluded socially.
scenario_text_ar: لاحظت أن شخصًا يتم استبعاده اجتماعيًا.

scenario_text_en: You are asked to take on extra tasks.
You feel grateful for recent support.
A friend suggests trying something adventurous.
You want to strengthen friendships.
You face a moral dilemma at work.
You want more independence in decisions.
scenario_text_ar: ترغب في مزيد من الاستقلالية في قراراتك.

scenario_text_en: You feel your life lacks balance.
scenario_text_ar: تشعر بأن حياتك تفتقر إلى التوازن.
